title: Asynchronous remodeling in DMD (MIDO-BMD_Pos-1UP)

title: Asynchronous remodeling in DMD (MIDO-BMD_Pos-3UP)
characteristics: age: 37.6; tissue: vastus lateralis; pathology: mild; Sex: M; mutation: Deletion Exons 45-47; pathology note: excellent condition. It showed fiber size variation, mild fibrosis, numerous central nuclei, 1-2 hypercontracted fibers, and a few small areas of regeneration. This pathology is characteristic of an early stage dystrophy

title: Asynchronous remodeling in DMD (MIDO-BMD_Pos-4UP)

Splitting and central nuclei.Lobulated fibers.Increase in both endo and perymisial connective. Some adipose infiltraction. End stage dystrophy.
